member.summary: Enumeration of a result of an activation of an enumeration of Windows features.

member.summary: The feature activation was successful.

member.summary: The feature activation has failed.

member.summary: Dism could not be initialized (e.g. because of missing privileges).

member.summary: All features are activated.

member.summary: At least one feature is not enabled.

member.summary: The read of the activity states of the features could not be executed successfully

member.summary: A restart of the system is required.

member.name: F:EQ3.TMWeb.ConfigurationTool.IisConfiguration.Features.DismFeatureActivationStateType.DismCouldNotBeInitialized
member.summary: Dism could not be initialized (e.g. because of missing privileges).
